text:
@SpeakerPelosi @SpeakerPelosi LET'S PUT YOUR ScareStats INTO PERSPECTIVE. There are almost 5 TIMES MORE heart disease deaths than COVID deaths:

LEADING CAUSES OF DEATH IN US
Heart disease 647,457
Cancer 599,108
Accidents 169,936
Chronic lower respiratory diseases 160,201

#COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/2rNbFmWMRw
